summary:
*Transformers* is an action-packed sci-fi movie about a teen, Sam, who gets caught in a battle between good and evil robots from space. The Autobots want to use a powerful artifact, the AllSpark, to rebuild their home. But the Decepticons want it to create an army. Sam helps the Autobots, led by Optimus Prime, to stop the evil Megatron.

The movie was the start of a popular series, with cool effects and lots of action. It even won some awards for its visuals. The film also had famous actors like Shia LaBeouf and Megan Fox.
title: Transformers (film)
